com.facebook.buck.step.fs

Class MkdirAndSymlinkFileStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.step.CompositeStep
      • com.facebook.buck.step.fs.MkdirAndSymlinkFileStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step, java.lang.Iterable<Step>

    public final class MkdirAndSymlinkFileStep
extends CompositeStep
    Ensures the directory of the target path is created before a file is symlinked to it.
